raw_text: The patient is complaining from bilateral knee pain since five years. Two years ago, the pain increased. Plane X-ray was done showing advanced osteoarthritis grade 4. Non-steroidal anti-inflammatory was given for around one month with muscle relaxants showing mild improvement. She is now doing physiotherapy exercises to see again after two weeks.
refined_text: The patient has been experiencing bilateral knee pain for five years. The pain worsened two years ago. A plain X-ray revealed advanced osteoarthritis (grade 4). Non-steroidal anti-inflammatory drugs (NSAIDs) and muscle relaxants were prescribed for approximately one month, resulting in mild improvement. She is currently undergoing physiotherapy exercises and will be reassessed after two weeks.
translated_text: The patient has been experiencing bilateral knee pain for five years. The pain worsened two years ago. A plain X-ray revealed advanced osteoarthritis (grade 4). Non-steroidal anti-inflammatory drugs (NSAIDs) and muscle relaxants were prescribed for approximately one month, resulting in mild improvement. She is currently undergoing physiotherapy exercises and will be reassessed after two weeks.

json_data.history_of_illness: The patient has been experiencing bilateral knee pain for five years. The pain worsened two years ago.
json_data.current_medication: Non-steroidal anti-inflammatory drugs (NSAIDs) and muscle relaxants
json_data.imaging_results: A plain X-ray revealed advanced osteoarthritis (grade 4)

reasoning: The patient presents with bilateral knee pain, a chief complaint that has been ongoing for five years and worsened over the past two years. The diagnosis of advanced osteoarthritis (grade 4) is supported by the plain X-ray findings, corresponding to ICD-10 code M17.0 for bilateral primary osteoarthritis. The patient was initially treated with NSAIDs and muscle relaxants, which resulted in mild improvement. Currently, the patient is undergoing physiotherapy exercises. The plan includes reassessment after two weeks to evaluate the effectiveness of the ongoing physiotherapy.
